titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab: Transcribed cards. s1: address could be "du Bois de Boulogne," but seems mispelled s2: Nov 5 = crossed out, can't read

body.ab:
1938 Harden Miss E. 14 rue du Buis de Bologne Neuilly, Seine 1m 1vol B 50v deposit 50v
Oct 26 Writings of E.M. Forester Nov 2 Nov 2 Being Geniuses Together Nov 4 Nov 4 Man Against Himself Nov 12 Nov 12 Best Short Stories '38 Nov 15 " My Wife's the Least of It 2v Nov 15 Nov 15 Rainer Marie Rilke trio 14v Nov 29 Nov 29 sub ren 1 vol 1 m B 50v
Nov 29 Transition Dec 2 Dec 2 Georgian Literary Scene Dec 8 Dec 8 Life and Letters of Galsworthy Dec 15 Dec 15 Bee & other Essays of Goldsmith Dec 15 extra 4v pd. 30 Criticism and Appreciation of Charles Dickens Jan 5 Dec 29 - Jan 29 Sub ren 1m 1v B 50v Dec Jan 6 Everlasting Man Jan 14 6 Orthodoxy 1v Jan 14 Jan 14 New Jerusalem Jan 24 24 Walter Whitman's Poetry Jan 29 March 1st Jan 29 - Feb 29 sub ren 1m 1v B 50v Renewed October 8th 1941 - Jan 8th 1942 65 dep (left last time) Oct 8 James Joyce, Herbert Gorman Oct 22 Oct 22
(can take 2 books) Oct 22 Flowering Judas Nov. 5 22 Best Short Stories of 1930 Am Nov. 5 Nov. 5 Verses After many a summer Nov 11 5 Experiments Nov 12 12 Fat of the cat Nov 26 Ulysses renewed Nov 26, ren dec. 10 ren du 26 Axel's Castle Dec. 10 Dec. 10 James Joyce's Ulysses (S.B.'s copy) ren du
Dec 18 SB wrote per friend enclosed 50v
